Quote by Jarvis Cocker of the British band Pulp: "Fucking rich kid. This revolution isn't yours (It's the common people’s)." © Eric Zolov.
"We are one social body;" "It’s prohibited to give up." © Eric Zolov.
Silk screen of cactus in bloom. © Eric Zolov.

"The Revolution Will Not be Televised." © Eric Zolov.
"I Don’t Believe you Anymore": poster aimed at televised mass media biases. © Eric Zolov.
Quote by Angela Davis: "I am no longer accepting the things I cannot change; I am changing the things I cannot accept." © Eric Zolov.
